name: Gear Aid Aquaseal+SR Shoe Repair 28g
description: Used as either a preventative measure or to repair ripped and torn seams, Aquaseal seals holes, severed seams, and torn stitching on leather, vinyl, and synthetics. This tough, flexible, transparent urethane is not affected by heat, water, or solvents.Not to be used as waterproofer on entire upper surfaces - use on seams only.
